content.raw:
Building on Carlos' thoughts...

 * Would be interesting to demonstrate a few (2) different wave conditions: small and large waves.  Nice to see the simulated camera/lidar in the situations since that is key for stressing the algorithms.

 * Would be nice to have a series of small, single topic videos, on different features.  Then we stitch them together into a highlight reel.  Will make it easier to update as we update/improve/add new features.

It is looking really great and I think ONR/AUVSI/RobotX will love it.
content.html:
Building on Carlos' thoughts...

  • Would be interesting to demonstrate a few (2) different wave conditions: small and large waves. Nice to see the simulated camera/lidar in the situations since that is key for stressing the algorithms.

  • Would be nice to have a series of small, single topic videos, on different features. Then we stitch them together into a highlight reel. Will make it easier to update as we update/improve/add new features.

It is looking really great and I think ONR/AUVSI/RobotX will love it.
